main.bio: Currently I am looking for a job after the theology school where I was a student got closed. I also worked there as an assistant administrator and a librarian. I am proficient in Missional Leadership Training (International Christian Youthworks). I love teaching and learning from others. I also love reading and by extension proofread. I'm developing an interesting DIY project.
main.contactmessage: Can connect me to a job? Contact me with the form below or the phone number below or email.
